message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth at least $1000000 to me. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount from what it's truly worth to me, so I'm hoping you'll see the potential here.  Let me know if you're interested in learning more.
